entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Rain mixed with snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
